Articles.Content:
First of all, great job on 0.22 Update... It looks awesome..

Is there any place, where I can find the full tech tree?

Thanks for the tree, it helps. Aside- am I the only one a little confused by this tree? I mean things like struts and structural cages are placed AFTER probe cores and such... seems somewhat haphazard. o.O

Thanks for the tree, it helps. Aside- am I the only one a little confused by this tree? I mean things like struts and structural cages are placed AFTER probe cores and such... seems somewhat haphazard. o.O

(Hello Tassyr; havn't seen you for awhile ) I think that is.... um..... well........ what? Aren't probes and things like that harder to make than struts?

Silly kerbals, what have you done.

Hey thanks a lot...

Any data on what unlocks which parts?
